silver.information: No look is complete without the perfect pair of earrings. The Elan Earrings are minimal enough to effortlessly match any of our products. Featuring our signature Daniel Wellington logo engraved ever so subtly on the outside of the earrings, say hello to your new everyday essentials.

One Size.Material: Stainless steel (316L) and rose gold plating

rosegold.information: No look is complete without the perfect pair of earrings. The Elan Earrings are minimal enough to effortlessly match any of our products. Featuring our signature Daniel Wellington logo engraved ever so subtly on the outside of the earrings, say hello to your new everyday essentials.

One Size.Material: Enamel and stainless steel (316L) with rose gold plating

satin-white.information: Every look starts with the details. The Emalie Earrings are inspired by and made to complement our enameled pieces. Seamlessly pair with our Classic Bracelet and Classic Ring in Satin White and tie the look together with our new Emalie Necklace.

One Size.Material: Ceramic (main body) and stainless steel (316L) with rose gold plating

black.information: The Aspiration Earrings are a true celebration of timeless elegance. Designed to reflect the captivating appeal of the Aspiration Necklace, these studs are an everyday essential. The main body is made from ceramic, with a stainless steel and rose gold plated waist subtly engraved with our signature logo.

One Size.Material: Ceramic (main body) and stainless steel (316L) with rose gold plating
